oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Farming - Nature Conceptions, Management and Cross Compliance
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Højring, K.
Hansen, L.
Noe, E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Denmark
Social aspects
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic farmers perceptions of qualities in nature do not clearly correspond with the biologists ideas of nature quality. The differences in perception hold both opportunities and conflicts.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Danish Research Center for Organic Farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Højring, K.; Hansen, L. and Noe, E. (2004) Organic Farming - Nature Conceptions, Management and Cross Compliance. DARCOFenews (2).
